title: Technology-Integrated Social Education Through Digital Games and Phenomenological Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, incorporating phenomenological experiences related to learner identity, multiculturalism, and community issues

learning_goals: Learners design and implement case studies exploring social issues using digital games at least three times
Learners produce social phenomenon analysis reports reflecting their experiences and identities in technology-integrated educational settings
Learners present at least one solution for addressing social issues through digital game-based approaches via small-group collaborative learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
